author: NFT-DAO (the whole team)
title: NFT-DAO EZ-Ticket dispenser
description: Ticket authenticity and scalping at much higher prices make it difficult to control who is buying, selling, or redeeming a ticket.
solution: With NFTs, smart tickets are verifiable, interoperable and have clear ownership. A ticket redeemed at an event lives on in digital wallets.
experience: NFT-DAO has committed developers and over 30 qualified marketing, graphics and business professionals contributing to the NFT Framework.
